title: New Fiora player hehe
body: Been a 1 trick Riven main for this whole account and recently got introduced to Fiora, any tips on her play style and overall combo? Her play style for me takes a bit to get used to and i want to make sure i have it right, so does her combos. Also, is essence reaver good on her? Since her E garuntees 2 crits? Let me know <3 Thanks

replies.body:
>Since her E garuntees 2 crits?

Her is a guaranteed crit on the second auto, not 2 crits.

Most Fiora's go things like Hydra/BC into tank, but damage you can just basically build like riven, and you will be fine.

Essence seems a bit too costly with less to offer for Fiora, unless you're **very** ahead and just want to have some fun. 
Ravenous and BC should be enough for damage though with an extra armor pen item like Maw. Should focus on finishing defensive items depending on how your lane is going, but ravenous should usually be a must-get item for splitting potential. 

I'm no Fiora main or expert, but these are the basics I know.
Came across a guide I read when attempting to answer your question, could be of great help as it's from a Master tier player:
http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/actually-master-wip-6-18-top-lane-domination-w-fiora-445898
